body:
Hello Temporal team,

I'm one of the co-chairs of the CNCF TAG-Runtime. I'm reaching out because we'd love for you to present/discuss the Temporal project in one of our meetings We'd love to learn more about the project in general, its adopters, future plans, etc.  Let us know if that's something you'd like to do.

Feel free to add it to our [agenda](https://bit.ly/cncf-tag-runtime-meeting-notes) or reach out to me (raravena80 at gmail.com) at your convenience.

Thanks!

comments.body:
Hi @raravena80! We here have a lot of reverence for CNCF projects. I have sent you an email. Feel free to respond there or find me on our Slack instance at https://t.mp/slack.

(closing issue since it's not actionable on this repo)

title: CNCF TAG-Runtime Discussion/Presentation (?)
